commodities.tests.technical
Class StatsAbstract

java.lang.Object
  commodities.tests.technical.StatsAbstract
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MovingAverageExponentialTest.Stats, MovingAverageTest.Stats, MovingAverageTriangleTest.Stats, StochasticKDExponentialTest.Stats, StochasticKDTest.Stats, StochasticKDTriangleTest.Stats, StochasticTest.Stats
public abstract class StatsAbstract
extends Object
implements Comparable

The StatsAbstract contains methods used by all statistics classes within technical tests.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11
